description: Transforms all the letters of a string to lowercase or uppercase, changes the first letter of a string to a capital, or transforms a string to a parameter making it a URL-friendly value.
label: Transform Text

options.name: value
options.label: Text value
options.info: The value that's going to be transformed

options.name: downcase
options.label: Downcase
options.info: Transforms all characters of a string to lowercase.

options.name: capitalize
options.label: Capitalize
options.info: Changes the first letter of a string to a capital.

options.name: upcase
options.label: Upcase
options.info: Transforms all the letters of a string to uppercase.

options.name: parameterize
options.label: Parameterize
options.info: Transforms a string to a parameter, making it a URL-friendly value.
